src:
DUTB v prodajo 30 stanovanj v Koprskih vratih
05 Nov 2019, 10:28 by STA

Družba za upravljanje terjatev bank (DUTB) bo 2. decembra začela prodajati preostalih 30 stanovanj v koprskem objektu Koprska vrata. Ogledi so mogoči že sedaj, nakup stanovanj in dodatnih parkirnih mest pa bo potekal z zbiranjem zavezujočih ponudb, so danes sporočili iz DUTB.



Družba za upravljanje terjatev bank (DUTB) bo 2. decembra začela prodajati preostalih 30 stanovanj v koprskem objektu Koprska vrata. Foto: Tomaž Primožič/FPA

KOPER > V prvi fazi prodaje v aprilu in maju letos je bilo v Koprskih vratih na voljo 162 stanovanj s pripadajočimi parkirnimi mesti in shrambami v podzemnih garažah. 81 stanovanj je že dobilo nove lastnike. V drugi fazi prodaje, ki je potekala v oktobru, je bilo na 80 e-dražbah uspešno draženih 51 stanovanj. Skupno bo tako v pol leta prodanih 132 stanovanj.
DUTB bo decembra začela zadnjo prodajno fazo, v kateri bo preostalih 30 stanovanj in 13 dodatnih parkirnih mest prodajala z zbiranjem zavezujočih ponudb.
"Nakup bo omogočen kupcu, ki bo po 2. decembru prvi podal zavezujočo ponudbo najmanj v višini objavljene izklicne cene ter s plačilom varščine v višini 5000 evrov potrdil resnost nakupa. Če v istem dnevu DUTB prejme več kot eno ponudbo, bo stanovanje ali parkirno mesto prodala kupcu z višjo ponudbo oz. kupcu, ki je prvi oddal ponudbo," so pojasnili.
Katera stanovanja so prosta in kakšne so izklicne cene, je razvidno na spletni stani www.koprskavrata.eu, kjer so objavljene tudi podrobnosti o načinu prodaje. Zainteresirani kupci se že lahko dogovorijo za voden ogled.
Vzorčno stanovanje in stanovanje, v katerem je urejena prodajna pisarna, bosta naprodaj v zaključni fazi, so sporočili.
Nadaljuje se tudi prodaja v poslovnem delu objekta Koprska vrata, in sicer z zbiranjem nezavezujočih ponudb, v kratkem pa bodo za najbolj zaželene enote objavljeni tudi razpisi za zbiranje zavezujočih ponudb. Ogledi poslovnih prostorov so še naprej možni po predhodnem naročilu. Postopek prodaje stanovanj in poslovnih enot vodi družba Remax.
Stanovanja v objektu Koprska vrata, ki stoji v neposredni bližini obale, mestnega središča in avtocestne povezave, so različnih tlorisov in površin od 38 do 154 kvadratnih metrov, tista v višjih nadstropjih imajo tudi večje terase. V pritličju je več kot 2000 kvadratnih metrov poslovnih prostorov, ki pa so nedokončani, zato jih mora kupec pred uporabo dokončati in pridobiti uporabno dovoljenje.
text:
BAMC for sale 30 apartments in Koper Gate
05 Nov 2019, 10:28 by STA

The Bank Assets Management Company (BAMC) will start selling the remaining 30 flats at the Koper Gate facility in Koper on December 2nd. Tours are possible now, and the purchase of apartments and additional parking spaces will be completed by the collection of binding offers, BAMC announced today.



The Bank Assets Management Company (BAMC) will start selling the remaining 30 flats at the Koper Gate facility in Koper on December 2nd. Photo: Tomaz Primozic / FPA

KOPER> In the first phase of sales in April and May this year, there were 162 apartments available in Koper Gate with associated parking spaces and storage facilities in underground garages. 81 flats have already been given new owners. In the second phase of the sale, which took place in October, 51 flats were successfully auctioned at 80 e-auctions. In total, 132 apartments will be sold in half a year.
In December, BAMC will launch the final sale phase, selling the remaining 30 apartments and 13 additional parking spaces by collecting binding offers.
"The purchase will be open to the buyer who, after December 2, will be the first to make a binding offer at least in the amount of the published starting price and to confirm the seriousness of the purchase by paying a security deposit of 5,000 EUR. sold to the buyer with the higher bid or the first bidder, "they explained.
Which apartments are vacant and what are the starting prices, can be seen on the website www.koprskavrata.eu, where details of the method of sale are published. Interested buyers can already arrange a guided tour.
The model apartment and the apartment that houses the sales office will be for sale in the final stages, they said.
Sales in the business part of the Koper Gate facility will continue, with the collection of non-binding offers, and calls for proposals for the collection of binding offers will be announced shortly for the most desirable units. Tours of the premises are still possible upon prior order. The process of selling apartments and business units is managed by Remax.
The apartments in the Koper Gate, which is located near the coast, the city center and the motorway connection, have different floor plans and areas from 38 to 154 square meters, and those on the higher floors also have larger terraces. On the ground floor there are more than 2000 square meters of office space, which are unfinished, so the buyer must complete and obtain a valid permit before use.
